mapper.insert: insert into car (id, user_id, car_no, brand, car_lord, reg_time, reg_img, car_type, status, create_time, is_stop) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carLord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{regImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isStop,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update car
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_lord = #{carLord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
reg_img = #{regImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_stop = #{isStop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update car set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_lord = #{carLord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, reg_img = #{regImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_stop = #{isStop,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t.FIRST_LETTER firstLetter,t.MAKE_NAME makeName from car_type t
select t.FIRST_LETTER firstLetter,t.MAKE_NAME makeName, t.MODEL_NAME modelName from car_type t where t.make_name = #{makeName}
